plot: Asha Truss, an urban African-American schoolteacher, has been fascinated by India all her life. Inspired by a photo of her grandmother at the Taj Mahal, she travels there for the first time...
title: Asha goes to India
plot_es: Asha Truss, an urban African-American schoolteacher, has been fascinated by India all her life. Inspired by a photo of her grandmother at the Taj Mahal, she travels there for the first time...
plot_en: Asha Truss, an urban African-American schoolteacher, has been fascinated by India all her life. Inspired by a photo of her grandmother at the Taj Mahal, she travels there for the first time...
